series_description: This series documents occupational injuries and illnesses. series may include, but is not limited to: reports and logs, but excludes sick leave reports maintained for payroll purposes. CFR 1904(C) and (D)

series_title: Affirmative Action/Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) Plans
series_description: This series documents affirmative action, Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC), and/or Equal Employment Services (EES) plans. This series may include, but is not limited to: plans
retention_statement: 3 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Affirmative Action/Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) Progress Reports
series_description: This series documents any affirmative and/or equal action taken by an agency. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports
This series documents the receipt of unsolicited applications or resumes for which no position has been announced. This may include, but is not limited to: applications and resumes.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents attendance at classes, meetings, and seminars for training or continuing education purposes. This series may include, but is not limited to: logs, registers, and sign-in sheets, but excludes attendance records maintained for payroll purposes.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents the criminal history, if any, of a job applicant for the purposes of making a hiring decision. This series may include, but is not limited to: criminal background investigation reports, fingerprint cards, central registry forms, and other security records.

This series documents the investigation into any act(s) of discrimination filed by an employee. This series may include, but is not limited to: investigative and interview notes, logs, reports, and Equal Employment Opportunity Commission (EEOC) claims

series_title: Drug and Alcohol Screening or Testing Records: Negative Results
series_description: This series documents the administration and negative results of alcohol and drug screening or testing of job applicants or employees. This series may include, but is not limited to: logs, registers, and reports.

series_title: Drug and Alcohol Screening or Testing Records: Positive Results
series_description: This series documents the administration and positive results alcohol and drug screening or testing of job applicants or employees. This series may include, but is not limited to: logs, registers, and reports.

This series documents requests for tuition assistance, the approval or denial of the requests, and any required This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, evaluation forms, and reports.

This series documents an employee's request for accommodation(s) made under the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). This series may include, but is not limited to, applications, correspondence, and supporting documentation

series_title: Employee ADA Accommodation Requests: Involuntary Termination
series_description: This series documents the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) accommodation requests made by an employee who been or is being involuntarily terminated. This series may include, but is not limited to, applications, lay-off/termination related records, correspondence, and supporting documentation
This series documents employee work assignments, titles, phone numbers and/or addresses. This series may include, is not limited to: logs, registers, and reports.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents, at the time of hire, an employee's to perform a specific task, function or job, and/or that the employee's health meets requirements set by the employer. This series may include, but is not limited to: certificates and reports.

This series documents any long-term health risk, as well as health treatment or examination given to an employee by a medical professional of the agency or an agent of the agency for exposure to hazardous substances, or on-the-job injuries, for the employeeâ€™s general well being. This series may include, but is not limited to: health assessments, medical clearance or release to duty notices, reports, x-rays, and other records related to Series 100473 "Accident/Illness Reports."

This series documents any employee's history. This series should include, but is not limited to: date range employed, contact information, compensation and position history, reason for separation/termination, personnel action notices, and any retirement benefits information.

This series documents any employee's work activity and that is not included in the Long Term series. This series may include, but is not limited to: test results; professional certification and qualification records; evaluations; disciplinary actions; promotion/demotion, layoff, termination or tenure records; return to work notifications (issued by employer); and any other non-long term record.

series_title: Employment Eligibility Form and Records (I-9): Employee Employed Less Than Two Years
series_description: This series documents the employer's verification at the time hire that any prospective employee or recruit is a U.S. citizen, resident alien, or legal immigrant eligible to work in the U.S. as required by the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services. series may include, but is not limited to: forms

series_title: Employment Eligibility Form and Records (I-9): Employee Employed More Than Two Years
series_description: This series documents the employer's verification at the time hire that any prospective employee or recruit is a U.S. citizen, resident alien, or legal immigrant eligible to work in the U.S. as required by the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services. series may include, but is not limited to: forms
This series documents the interview or survey of employees prior to their departure from the agency. This series may include, but is not limited to: notes, completed surveys, and reports.

This series documents the initial complaint, actions, investigation, summary, and disposition of an employee grievance. This series may include, but is not limited to: investigative and interview notes, logs, and reports.

This series documents the occurrence of an incident, and any subsequent investigation, that involves the employees/facilities of an agency, or the public, and has reasonable possibility of legal consequences. This series may include, but is not to: investigative and interview notes, logs, and reports, as well as materials related to Series 100473, "Accident/Illness Reports."

This series documents compliance with federal Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) regulations, as well as Virginia Department of Labor and Industry's Occupational Safety and Health (VOSH) regulations. This series may but is not limited to: reports, logs, and policy and program documentation
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the determination of compensation for an individual, a job, or a group of jobs within the agency. This series may include, but is not limited to: worksheets, requests, studies, and reports

This series documents the need for a position, the task requirements for performing the job, the job title, and/or approval. This series may include, but is not limited to: position descriptions, survey results, worksheets, requests, and
retention_statement: 5 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Promotion, Demotion, Separation, or Tenure Records
series_description: This series documents the decisions made regarding demotion, separation, layoff, termination, or tenure for a particular employee or group of employees. This series may include, but is not limited to: staffing templates, budget reports, performance and composite data, and position evaluations

series_title: Recruitment, Hiring, Interview and Selection Records
series_description: This series documents the process and result of recruiting, selecting, and hiring. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications of selected and rejected applicants, position descriptions, copies of announcements and advertisements, selection criteria, evaluations, interview notes, tests, work samples, and rankings.

This series documents arrangements for employees to their official duties remotely at a location other than the agency's traditional worksite, such as the employee's or other approved location(s). This series includes, but is not limited to: telework agreements.
retention_statement: 3 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents any test or testing process for employee evaluation, retention, or promotion. This series may include, but is not limited to: tests and results.

series_title: Training Records Not Required for Certification or Qualification
series_description: This series documents employees' attendance in classes, conferences, courses, meetings, seminars, workshops, and other training or educational initiative not required for licensing, certification, or qualification. This series may include, but is limited to: logs, registration forms, attendance approval, attendance records, and reports.

This series documents the response made to and the results received from the Virginia Employment Commission in the review of unemployment claims. This series may include, but not limited to: correspondence, reports, and forms.
This series documents the receipt of and responses to for verification of an individual's employment. This series may include, but is not limited to: release, waiver, and correspondence.

This series documents an employee's visa, green card, and immigration records. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, correspondence, required documentation for the employee, and other related records.

This series documents the recruitment, selection, and work history of volunteers. This series may include, but is not limited to: application, approval, denial, assignment, performance, training, and attendance records.
